file_content.text: My Master again cautions me to remain calm, even as I'm bombarded with visions of my father's pain. I must... try.
Visions of my father ripped to shreds by... Sand People, and Master Farlonn preaches temperance! I cannot stay, cannot complete my training!
Damn the consequences. I will avenge myself on the Sand People! I will destroy their Chieftan who dealt my father's killing blow!
Many Sand People have died by my hand, but my need for vengeance will not be quenched until the Chieftan is dead!
I was blinded by my... rage. The Chieftan was... unexpectedly... cunning. My father's fellow settlers... are being held at the Chieftan's... camp.
I have failed my father... and his people. I've failed my Master. I've failed my--myself....
